title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: This project serves as a platform to showcase my work, connect with professionals, and share my experiences while exploring React, animations, and UX/UI design principles. As my first website, it has been an invaluable learning experience that has enhanced my skills!

title: Book Angel
description: Book Angel is my personalized book tracking app and an alternative to Goodreads. It features GoogleBooks API, custom bookshelves, half-star ratings, AI-powered summaries, and similar book recommendations to enhance reading experiences.

title: Power75
description: Power75 is a submission for the HooHacks 2024 hackathon that helps users tackle the 75 Hard Challenge by tracking progress. The app features a motivational welcome screen, a resettable to-do list, a photo feed, notes, and a profile page with resources and tracking through a pie chart.
